game.name: Warp Mania
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A fast, challenging sci-fi arcade game built around a simple idea: switch your color to match the shape and break through incoming energy gates. Only your reflexes will keep you alive !
game.shortDescriptionEn: A fast, challenging sci-fi arcade game built around a simple idea: switch your color to match the shape and break through incoming energy gates. Only your reflexes will keep you alive !
